author: alfred_the_buttler
title: Very fun set for pre-schoolers
review:
This is one of my son's first, and still one of his favorite sets.  Whenever you have a police and a bad guy you are in for a lot of fun, but this set also gives you three $100 bills and a sack of money.  In fact the helicopter takes a back seat to the minifigures and accessories for my son, ut is still fun.

The helicopter is very simple to build thanks 2 bricks accounting for 95% of its mass.  This of course makes it a great starter set, but it is still enough to keep my son interested over a year later.  However, it is also very simple to break, and my son doesn't like rebuilding sets as he plays with them.  The spotlight constantly falls off, and really everything else (with an exception for the main propellors) fall off easily.  For this reason I can't rate the building experience very high.

Of course with just two minifigures, this set needs to be combined with other police sets to make play more interesting.  As a result, this set is always being combined with several other police sets.
